# Academic Portfolio Website - Prof. Tamal Kumar Mukherjee

## Project Overview
Professional academic portfolio for Prof. Tamal Kumar Mukherjee, Associate Professor in Physics at Adamas University.

## Tech Stack
- React 18 with Vite
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- React Icons for UI elements

## Color Palette
- Background: #081229
- Primary Text: #FFFFFF
- Accent: #00E3E3
- Secondary Accent: #94A3B8
- Card Background: #0F1C38

## Project Status
✅ Project structure created
✅ All components implemented
✅ Responsive design completed
✅ Animations integrated
✅ Build verified
✅ Content updated from CV
✅ UI/UX improvements added (References, Examinations, Animations)
